about_the_game:
Get ready to break a sweat in Ceiling Run, the ultimate fitness-meets-gaming experience! Ceiling Run brings the excitement of competitive running to your screen, combining real-life movement with thrilling virtual races. Using your Webcam, Ceiling Run tracks your real-world running pace, so the faster you run in place, the faster your character sprints through the game. It’s fitness, fun, and friendly competition all rolled into one!

Key Features:

  • Real-Life Movement Integration: Run in place and watch your in-game avatar mirror your speed. Lift your arms to change lanes, dodge obstacles, and keep your run smooth. Challenge yourself to go faster and leave your opponents in the dust!

  • Multiplayer Madness: Connect with friends or join the public lobbies, Push other players out of the way to get ahead, because every inch counts!

  • Dynamic Athletic Tracks: Compete in rendered virtual athletic tracks, where the stakes are high, and the competition is fierce. Stay sharp, avoid hazards, and master lane changes to stay in the lead!

  • Fitness & Fun: Ceiling Run isn’t just a game; it’s a workout! Burn calories, improve your fitness, and have a blast doing it. The physical mechanics—like arm movement to switch lanes—keep you constantly engaged.

  • Global Leaderboards: Track your progress and climb the ranks on global leaderboards. Will you be the fastest runner in the world?

Lace up your running shoes, grab your friends, and dive into the most exhilarating race of your life—right from your living room. Avoid obstacles, push your rivals, and master lane changes as you sprint to the top. Are you ready to become the Ceiling Run champion?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6600 / AMD Ryzen™ 5 2500X
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon™ R9 390X (or equivalent with 4 GB VRAM)
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Camera required to play

short_description: The ultimate fitness game where real-life running controls your in-game avatar. Sprint in place to race against friends across platforms on virtual tracks. The faster you run, the faster you move in the game. Get fit, have fun, and compete to be the fastest!
